tests.test_datasets.TestChessData¶

class tests.test_datasets.TestChessData¶

Bases: object

__init__()¶

Methods

__init__()

test_database_matches_environment(...)

test_dataset_creation(full_data)

test_full_observation_record(...)

Exists to remind of the current limitation noted in ChessData, where the environment creating observations for the data base overrules the PGN file.

Attributes

environment

test_full_observation_record(minimal_obs_game_data)¶

Exists to remind of the current limitation noted in ChessData, where the environment creating observations for the data base overrules the PGN file. So, not all positions will necessarily be observed and saved for the database.

minimal_obs_game_data pgn provides a game which is ultimately won, but drawn by PettingZoo’s Chess about move 53.
